quotes: The hard work soon paid off, as Iglesias inked a record contract in 1995.
The following year Iglesias took home numerous accolades, including a 1996 Grammy Award for best Latin performer,
In 1999, he made a career breakthrough with the song 'Bailamos' ('We Dance');
Iglesias released his first all-English record, Enrique (2000),
Iglesias delivered his next album, Sex and Love, in March 2014.
In 2018, Iglesias teamed with Bad Bunny on 'El Baño' and rejoined Pitbull for 'Move to Miami.'

quotes: Iglesias's 1997 follow-up, Vivir, went big as well, registering more than 5 million in sales and launching the singer's first-ever world tour.
